crops.name: Wheat
crops.description: Wheat is a major cereal grain used for food and livestock feed.
crops.growthConditions: Requires a temperate climate with moderate rainfall.

crops.name: Rice
crops.description: Rice is a staple food for over half of the world's population.
crops.growthConditions: Grows well in warm climates with plenty of water.

crops.name: Corn
crops.description: Corn is used for food, animal feed, and industrial products.
crops.growthConditions: Requires warm temperatures and moderate rainfall.
